plugin.name: jquery-checkAll
plugin.description: To check all the related checkboxes with a checkbox or button.

plugin.name: jquery-chkMerge
plugin.description: Merge the value of a group of checkboxes into an input element.

plugin.name: jquery-smartAt
plugin.description: A light weight plugin for checking the checkbox to input '@someone' in textarea.

plugin.name: jquery-pagination
plugin.description: A jquery plugin to create pagination list.

plugin.name: jquery-easyForm
plugin.description: A light weight plugin to change the way the form is submitted.

plugin.name: jquery-smartTag
plugin.description: A jquery plugin for adding and remove tags.

plugin.name: jquery-easyLoad
plugin.description: A jquery plugin for reloading content in an area on pages with events bound on element.

plugin.name: jquery-autoRefresh
plugin.description: A jquery plugin to refresh a page at intervals synchronously or asynchronously.
